personnal.title: Artificial Intelligence Student
personnal.description: Being admitted to the Master 2 **MLDS** at the University of Paris, I am looking for an **internship** starting from **March 1 st** in the field of **data science** or **AI**

itemize.title: Tasks
items: Development of an **API** to perform the **summarization** and **clustering** of **conversations**. The clusters are then labeled using **keyword extraction.**

itemize.title: Tasks
items: Conception and development of a **recommendation system** for services.

content.title: IT Department and Project Manager
content.description: GDSC is a science club affliated with Google to promote technology to young people

itemize.title: Tasks
items: **Supervision** of the IT sections, namely: AI section, web dev, game dev, security, etc

content.title: Automatic text summarization and clustering
content.paragraph: This project consits in taking a set of **conversations** as an input, **summarizing** each one of them and then **clustering** them into a set of **topics**. Each cluster is finally **labeled** using a **Keyword Extraction** algorithm. The main technologies involvled are : **transformers**, **spaCy**, **pytorch**, etc

content.title: Inteligent Traffic Light Control System
content.paragraph: My team and I were selected to participate in a national AI **competition** (AIMx). We designed and developed an **intelligent** system to control traffic lights to **reduce waiting time**. The main AI techniques used for this project are **deep reinforcement learning** and **computer vision**.

content.title: Swarm Robotics for Precision Farming
content.paragraph: With my team, we have designed a **system of robots** that can work together to perform **precision farming** operations. This project brings together several AI techniques, including **metaheuristic** algorithms, **computer vision**, etc.

content.title: Recommandation System
content.paragraph: I designed and developed a service **recommendation system** for the **YELP** platform. This system recommends to users **services** that meet their expectations. Several algorithms have been designed and implemented, including a semantic algorithm based on **ontologies**, an algorithm based on **NLP**, and a hybridization between the two.

content.title: Data Science - Samsung Innovation Campus
content.description: I received a scholarship fully funded by **Samsung** Algeria to intensively study **Data Science** during 3 months : 5 days/7  for 4 hours. In particular. **Statistics**, **Probabilities**, Machine Learning and Deep Learning

content.title: Algerian Robot Cup - Final Qualifier
content.description: Algerian Robot Cup is a **competition** of **robotics** and **artificial intelligence**, My team and I are qualified for the **final** qualifier that will be held and a **few weeks** from now.

content.title: Algeria Disrupt - Constantine, 3rd place
content.description: Algeria disrupt is a **yearly event** organized by the **ministry** to encourage new technologies, we have been chosen as being the **third-best project** if the AI thematic

content.title: Hult Prize USTHB, 2nd place
content.description: Hult prize is a social entrepreneurship **competition**, we have designed an AI to **predict food waste** along **distribution chains** in order to recover them before they are lost
